abstract: The nation’s second-largest telephone company said that its profit doubled during the last quarter, bolstered by an influx of customers attracted by its portfolio of iPhone and Android devices.
snippet: The nation’s second-largest telephone company said that its profit doubled during the last quarter, bolstered by an influx of customers attracted by its portfolio of iPhone and Android devices.
lead_paragraph: Verizon Communications, the nation’s second-largest telephone company, said on Friday that its profit doubled during the last quarter, bolstered by customers attracted by its portfolio of iPhone and Android devices.

headline.print_headline: Verizon Profit Doubles as Customers Flock to New Devices
